shrimp.name: While
shrimp.author: rconstruct

input.name: val
input.description: Condition value, true if non-zero, false if zero

input.name: true_val
input.description: Input value to pass through if exp is true
input.type: float color normal vector point string

input.name: false_val
input.description: Input value to pass through if exp is false
input.type: float color normal vector point string

output.name: out
output.description: if condition is true then this is true_val, otherwise it is false_val
output.type: float color normal vector point string

shrimp.usage: Val is a float that determines which input value is passed to the output. Any non-zero value is regarded as true.
